website_summaries.verdict: Hardy Salomon backpacking boot featuring a mix of comfort and ultimate protection and grip for the harshest weather conditions.
pros: Waterproof split suede leather protects feet from the elements
GORE-TEX keeps feet comfortable for long treks on various terrains
cons: Some users complain that laces aren't very durable

customer_reviews.title: Made for an elfin width foot, with arches to their knees
customer_reviews.text: 5th pair of Salomon's. Always fit. Used to x-country ski with this makers products. These shoes are the first Salomon product I have had a problem with. Much too narrow for medium, probably too narrow for narrow. I'll try again with a more expensive pair of Salomons but given the difficulty of returning AMAZON third party shipped products I'll now buy from REI and skip the "free" (if you don't have to drive 30 miles to UPS) returns at Amazon and shop elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: R.P.

customer_reviews.title: Will fail under rough conditions, but comfortable and keep water out
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, but coming apart after less than ~25mi in hikes (sole and where sole connects to boots). Desert rocks did them in a little. Buy them at a good price with Shoe Glue and they’re probably worth it — definitely less blisters than my Palladium High Pampas, but not as durable. Pretty good in terms of repelling water, but I always wear wool socks regardless to combat cold.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite for hiking
customer_reviews.text: With Salomons I always have to order half a size larger, the soles are very soft, I can feel every rock and root I step on. Great for walking on smooth surfaces without a pack but not in the woods especially if carrying a pack.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots due to their low cost and claimed durability. They are exactly what I was hoping for and I was extremely satisfied with them on my 9 day backpacking trip (140 miles) this summer. They still have plenty of miles left in them. However, I am a newbie to backpacking and if you are looking for a boot that is going to last for years to come and are thinking about doing a hike longer than I did I would recommend spending the money on the Salomon 4D 2 GTX boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Buys them year and year...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has bought these boots repeatedly for years. They give him great ankle support and don't rub or chafe. He has worn them for daily construction management work, for hiking, and for general use. He loves this model and says they are just as good as the Quest version, which is a lot more expensive. He thinks these are the best value and all around boot. Good looking and durable.
customer_reviews.author: emrm

customer_reviews.title: I would buy these again!
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and are very comfortable. Been on hikes, camping, through the water even used them for dirt bike riding (although not recommended) and these have held up really well. Since I've been using these a lot lately, probably get some active insoles by Dr. Scholls in there to help with support and comfort after more wear-and-tear becomes more evident.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great Boot for the price. Works well in warm country (TX hill country). Laces slip easily but I've found a lacing technique that seems to alleviate. If it keeps getting annoying I may switch out the laces. Seem to hold up good so far. They will get the true test soon in the Maroon Bells of Colorado!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Horstman

customer_reviews.title: Lots of miles on this boot
customer_reviews.text: My last Salomon boots (Quest 4D 2 GTX) had about 2,000 miles on them, after an exceedingly rainy summer. The boots split where the toe protector meets at the leather layer. That said, I love the fit and weight of the boots. I wear an 8 1/2, far smaller than most, and they fit exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: WV Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Salomon boots. I had a pair of XA Pro mid boots and purchased these because the XA Pro were discontinued. At first I was concerned whether these would live up to the XA Pros but that was unfounded. These are terrific hiking boots. I purchased them a few weeks before travelling to Iceland, where good boots are necessary if you want to stay safe on trails. At first they felt tight around the ankle but this resolved after a couple of hikes. We climbed behind a waterfall in a pouring rain. The boots stayed dry and provided excellent footing.
customer_reviews.author: terrierdad

customer_reviews.title: like them
customer_reviews.text: quite comfortable. correct sizing. waterproofing seems to work. good shock absorption and ankle support. good grip. performed well on 4 day backpacking trip in mountains; fairly sturdy but balanced more towards comfort.
customer_reviews.author: david grimm

customer_reviews.title: New favorite boot.
customer_reviews.text: Takes about three days to fully break in to a perfect fit. Laces are too long and slippery so a double wrap on the bow is necessary to keep them tied and a double bow to control length.
customer_reviews.author: Cyberguy

customer_reviews.title: and feel good. The lower side hooks are very tight
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit well, and feel good. The lower side hooks are very tight, and it takes dome effort to un-lace them. Even more so when you have a bad back. I needed to bend them outward to make them easier to unlace.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight hiker
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight hiker, super comfortable, great ankle support. This is my second pair, I got paint all over my last pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: The toe box is narrow and the boot fits small. I also do not like the way the boot feels across the top of my left foot. It's like there is seem that goes the length of the tongue. The insole is nowhere near as comfortable as the Quest Prime GTX Backpacking Boot.
customer_reviews.author: FOOSBALL

customer_reviews.title: After 8 month report.
customer_reviews.text: After 8 months the boots have held up well except the shoe laces have failed. Good grip. Very thin sole I feel every stone. The toe box is made from hard rubber with no give-my big toes are pressed in. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas corrigan

customer_reviews.title: too slim
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a decent boot however they were very skinny. After about 10 minutes both my feet would be sore. I don't believe I have very wide feet however I could not make it a day in these things if I tried. All that being said.... seems like a rugged boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have Boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot, lightweight, very comfortable. Great padding for the entire foot. Highly recommend. Solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: George Faella

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and no need to break in!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these boots! He said they were super comfortable and did not need any breaking in. The first time he wore them was on a 8 mile hike in the Rockies followed by 14 mile hike the next day. Walked through deep puddles, shallow creeks, up and down slick icy, snowy and muddy paths without a hitch. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Good backpacking boot.
customer_reviews.text: Good backpacking boot. Not the best, and muchbetterthan the worst, I'd say this boot falls directly into it's price range.
customer_reviews.author: Stonebrew

customer_reviews.title: Short boot life
customer_reviews.text: They were great boots for about a year then the footbed desingrated.
customer_reviews.author: zinggoo

customer_reviews.title: Salomon are just awesome..
customer_reviews.text: Salomon are just awesome... I had an older version of these boots and it was time to get the new ones. They are so confortable you want to wear them everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight tracking boots
customer_reviews.text: With Salomon shoes you need to order one size higher than your normal size. This is exactly what I ordered, so now it fits perfect! The boots itself is very well made and as a first impression they are comfortable(I did not yet used them for tracking).
customer_reviews.author: Eitan

customer_reviews.title: but wanted to switch to Salomon's because so many AT thru hikers like them. However
customer_reviews.text: Well, I've worn Merrell boots for years on the trail, but wanted to switch to Salomon's because so many AT thru hikers like them. However, than ran too small and narrow for me. I returned them, and went up a size. Those too were too small. I failed to try them out extensively during the return period, so, I had to keep them. I went back to my Merrells and so far am happy. I'm sure Salomon's are a good boot, esp for people w/ narrow feet. But I think I'll pass.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: These boots do run narrower than other boots I have  worn
customer_reviews.text: A very well made boot and they look sharp. However they narrower than any other sz 11 1/2 I have ever worn, which has made them very uncomfortable. I just hope they break in and stretch before the foot pain gets to be too much. Should have sent them back, buy a bigger or wider sz or a different model
customer_reviews.author: James W. Lang Jr.

customer_reviews.title: good support and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good support and very comfortable. Hubby says this boot requires no break-in. Great buy for $
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Great boots! My son wore them every day at ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! My son wore them every day at Summer Camp! They were brand new and gave him no issues. You'll love them.
customer_reviews.author: TheUnderhills

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it laces up (laces keep the heel ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it laces up (laces keep the heel snug). Fits perfectly and I haven't had to have a breaking in period.
customer_reviews.author: wrench

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Feel great and no break in time. Can't wait to put some more miles on
customer_reviews.author: Jt G.

customer_reviews.title: Seem narrow in the toe and Inside of toe cap ...
customer_reviews.text: Seem narrow in the toe and Inside of toe cap on one boot was pushing hard against my toe just walking around the house. I definitely see some issues if I wear these out on the trail and am returning them
customer_reviews.author: blowfish101

customer_reviews.title: Well pleased everything. I think they will wear long and ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size large so I could wear two pare socks, one being wool, and also gortex will not change much from the out of the box fitting. Well pleased everything. I think they will wear long and well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Fernald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: barely any break in period, lasted a ton of rough hikes in California woods. No complaints at all
customer_reviews.author: Hashman

customer_reviews.title: Had to return the first pair back & get a ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the first pair back & get a 1/2 size larger. Next pair will be 1 full size larger than original.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX and these boots feel like I have worn them for months
customer_reviews.text: RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX and these boots feel like I have worn them for months ! light in weight comfortable I have not tested it's ability to keep my feet dry. but I will, soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All around winner
customer_reviews.text: Great boot for backpacking and day day hikes. Keeps you stable and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Ski Man

customer_reviews.title: Salomon is my go-to!
customer_reviews.text: Quick break-in. After 4 miles of hiking and some office wear I felt no pain on an 11 mile backpacking trip.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Anthony LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: So close to being great
customer_reviews.text: It would have been a 5star, but the insoles are... Well not the best. A 20 buck fix, and they are much better.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ogle

customer_reviews.title: High quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Well made and comfortable. Size is true. Cleans easily with soap and a cloth after a muddy trail day. Better bang for the buck compared to Merrell.
customer_reviews.author: David in Missouri

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and water proof
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Warm, sturdy and water proof. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Todd K

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable. A good looking boot as well.
customer_reviews.author: Guido Von

customer_reviews.title: ) comfortable, my son is quite happy with them
customer_reviews.text: High quality :) comfortable , my son is quite happy with them, they are very nice looking , picture does not do them justice
customer_reviews.author: Evangeline

customer_reviews.title: Best hiking boot i have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit perfect right out of the box and didnt take much to break in. They are quite comfortable and have great tread. Cant wait to hit the PCT in these babies.
customer_reviews.author: Wile Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t taken a hike yet but they feel comfortable walking around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A.

customer_reviews.title: fit well
customer_reviews.text: shoelaces arent great but other than that a very durable and comfortable boot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pure heaven
customer_reviews.text: Took about a week to break them in. After that, it's been pure heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Delphia

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfortable! Already recommended to a friend
customer_reviews.text: They fit well, they've been on a dozen or so 5-9mi hikes, and they feel great. Last weekend they slipped into a creek and ended up with smothered in mud/red clay... foot stayed dry though! I just got back to moving again after a multiple fractures in my foot, and they provided plenty of support both for foot and ankle to get through the rocky hills in Oklahoma. They're pretty sturdy, so they're not the lightest and they do get a little warm. I'll follow up after more experiences with them, but so far they've earned their 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: Great so far! Lets see how they hold up...t(o be continued)
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box on, my feet and on a trail!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Palma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product in every way. Five stars to manufacturer and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Edward E Oh

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for recreational hiker
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pair of comfortable, durable boots but am a weekend hiker. I was pleasantly surprised by how comfortable these were when I first put them on; the cushioning is outstanding. I wore them one evening to break them in but this wasn't necessary. A few days later I wore them on a 5 mile moderate hike; no problems with traction, feeling rocks thru the sole or becoming uncomfortable. Can't speak to longer term yet but for the first week these are well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: LRK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and light weight. I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Rosaura

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: 1 Month old and already have a hole in both shoes by the toes
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great hikers
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had these long but was very surprised that there wasn't really any break in to speak of. Feet felt great and the second hike was a fairly strenuous trail. They are gortex lined so they don't breath the best, but are great for early spring hikes where the temps are cool.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: ... sizes run too small or too large these were perfect Love the traction on this home and a great ...
customer_reviews.text: The size of the shoe were right on typically sizes run too small or too large these were perfect Love the traction on this home and a great ankle support and they look very good
customer_reviews.author: Kado

customer_reviews.title: Infantryman tested and approved
customer_reviews.text: Great boot for everyday use or back country hiking and camping. Took on a hike up North Dome in Yosemite and half of the path was covered in snow and they did just fine keeping my feet warm. Infantryman tested and approved.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable hiking boot this is my third pair and they have large sizes including a needed 1/2 size where other boots jump from size 12 to 13 or 14 !!! Sold !
customer_reviews.author: K J Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Have not been able to use it yet. But fits as expected. I suggest getting 1/2 size bigger if you will be using thicker socks for more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boot for the money but the toe could be sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Brian David Lund

customer_reviews.title: love em.  On my 4th pair.
customer_reviews.text: my 4th pair I've had neuroma surgery on both feet. These are my go-to shoes for daily use. great for day hikes, work use, etc. The toe cap rubber does not handle abraision well, such as roofing shingles or asphalt, if you spend a lot of time on your hands and knees. Otherwise, I can't think of a complaint. Super comfy. I get 9 months of perfection, wearing them daily, then I buy a new pair, and retire the old pair to dirty jobs. After a short break in, they are as comfortable as sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: JASON B.

product_meta.title: Salomon Men's Authentic Leather & GORE-TEX Backpacking Boots
product_meta.description:
Your style is understated but rugged and technical. Classic trails with a storied history draw you to discover new places. Authentic ltr gtx delivers a lightweight, comfortable feel and classic leather style that looks great and lasts for years.

Salomon was born in 1947 in the heart of the French Alps and the birthplace of modern alpinism. Driven by a passion for skiing and design innovation, Francois Salomon and his son George designed and perfected much of the first modern ski equipment. During the following 60 years, Salomon's commitment to innovative design and passion for mountain sports created a vast range of revolutionary new concepts in boots, skis and apparel and brought innovative solutions to footwear, apparel and equipment for hiking, adventure racing, mountaineering and trail running. Through performance-driven design, Salomon enhances mountain sports by converting new ideas into action and expanding the limits of possibility.
feature_bullets: Upper Material: waterproof leather, synthetic mesh
